theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Autophagy Decline Theory of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on the decline of autophagy processes, including mitophagy, as a key driver of aging and cellular damage accumulation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Autophagy Decline Theory of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes autophagy as a homeostatic mechanism whose age-related decline contributes to neurodegenerative diseases and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senescence and SASP in Endocrine Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes cellular senescence and SASP effects specifically in endocrine tissues and hormonal dysregulation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senescence and SASP in Endocrine Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on cell cycle arrest, SASP, and DNA damage as core features of senescence contributing to aging and endocrine dysfunction.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senescence and SASP in Endocrine Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Highlights cell cycle arrest, SASP, and metabolic dysfunction in senescent cells affecting ovarian and endocrine aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senescence and SASP in Endocrine Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes senescence gene expression and SASP profiles in CNS aging and disease, linking to endocrine and systemic aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senescence and SASP in Endocrine Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links cellular senescence and SASP to preeclampsia and endocrine-related disease pathogenesis.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senescence and SASP in Endocrine Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on regulation and dual roles of SASP in senescence and aging, relevant to endocrine and systemic aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senescence and SASP in Endocrine Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes senescence-driven SASP secretion impacting tissue microenvironment and aging processes.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senescence and SASP in Endocrine Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Highlights the dual role of senescent cells in tissue repair and aging, focusing on SASP and regenerative effects.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senescence and SASP in Endocrine Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Details cell cycle arrest, SASP secretion, and senolytic interventions targeting senescent cells to mitigate aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: DNA Damage and Oxidative Stress-Induced Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on DNA damage, oxidative stress, mitochondrial dysfunction as triggers of senescence and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: DNA Damage and Oxidative Stress-Induced Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes senescence triggered by DNA damage and oxidative stress, with SASP and interventions to delay aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: DNA Damage and Oxidative Stress-Induced Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Explains senescence induced by telomere shortening and stress, SASP effects, and dual roles in cancer and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: DNA Damage and Oxidative Stress-Induced Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Covers senescent cell accumulation, dual roles, and therapeutic targeting in multiple tissues driven by DNA damage.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: DNA Damage and Oxidative Stress-Induced Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links senescence to immune aging and inflammageing driven by DNA damage and oxidative stress.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: DNA Damage and Oxidative Stress-Induced Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on DNA damage response triggering senescence, SASP-driven inflammation, and premature aging phenotypes.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: DNA Damage and Oxidative Stress-Induced Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes senescent cell accumulation and senolytic interventions targeting DNA damage-induced senescence.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: DNA Damage and Oxidative Stress-Induced Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Discusses decline in proliferative capacity due to DNA damage and accelerated senescence in progeroid syndromes.

theory_assignments.reasoning: Details endothelial cell senescence causing ECM disruption, blood-brain barrier dysfunction, and vascular aging.
